name: ORBE SQUAD - Action Game
description:
ORBE SQUAD - Action Game

Release N.: V.1.2 - 2009 - Freeware

http://www.orbemidia.com - dimitrikozma@gmail.com

Choose one of 3 characters and start a space adventure, just using a mouse button. Simple and funny!

-------

Choose one of 3 characters and start a space adventure, just using a mouse button. Simple and funny!

Features:

- Story Mode
- Arcade Mode
- Secret Codes
- Secret game mode

HOW TO PLAY

Just use the mouse button to control the rocket. It's all...

==========

This is a fun game! Enjoy!

created by Dimitri Kozma - www.orbemidia.com
